    • Uses of Order in jdbc.query

      Methods in jdbc.query that return types with arguments of type Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> NotificationQueries.CheckAllOrdersAndChangeToCancelledIfNeeded(java.time.LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Checks all orders with a 'Notified' status and updates them to 'Cancelled' if the current date and time surpass the order's enter date.
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> NotificationQueries.CheckAllOrdersAndChangeToNotifedfNeeded(java.time.LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Checks orders with a 'Wait Notify' status to see if their enter date matches the current date and time, and updates their status to 'Notified' accordingly.
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> NotificationQueries.CheckAllWaitingListOrdersAndCancelAutomaticallyIfNotConfirmed()
      Automatically cancels orders that have been in a 'Notified Waiting List' status for a specific period (e.g., 2 hours) without confirmation from the user.
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> NotificationQueries.CheckWaitingListAndRemoveAllIrrelcantOrders(java.time.LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Checks all orders in the waiting list and marks them as irrelevant if their enter date is earlier than the specified localDateTime.
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> OccasionalQueries.getAllOccasionalOrdersInPark(int parkId)
      Retrieves all occasional visit orders for a specific park that are marked as 'In Park' on the current date.
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> OrderQueries.importAllOrdersForToday(int parkId)
      Retrieves all orders, both from preorders and occasional visits, that are scheduled for today at a specific park.
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> OrderQueries.notifyTheNextOrdersInWaitingList(java.time.LocalDateTime enterDate, int parkId)
      Notifies the next orders in the waiting list for a specific park and enter date.
      java.util.ArrayList<Order> OrderQueries.searchForNotifiedOrdersOfSpecificClient(java.lang.String customerId)
      Retrieves a list of orders that have been notified or are in the notified waiting list for a specific client.
